templates.name: Radial Gauge
templates.description: Circular gauge showing progress around a ring. Classic gauge visualization.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='none' stroke='%23E5E7EB' stroke-width='10'/><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='none' stroke='%230EA5E9' stroke-width='10' stroke-dasharray='175 251' transform='rotate(-90,50,50)'/></svg>

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure

templates.name: Radial Gauge with Center Label
templates.description: Radial gauge with percentage displayed in the center.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='none' stroke='%23E5E7EB' stroke-width='10'/><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='40' fill='none' stroke='%230EA5E9' stroke-width='10' stroke-dasharray='175 251' transform='rotate(-90,50,50)'/><text x='50' y='55' text-anchor='middle' font-size='20' font-weight='bold' fill='%23374151'>70%</text></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _maxValue = {{max_value}}
VAR _pct = MIN(MAX(_value / _maxValue, 0), 1)
VAR _size = {{size}}
VAR _strokeWidth = {{stroke_width}}
VAR _radius = (_size / 2) - (_strokeWidth / 2)
VAR _circumference = 2 * 3.14159 * _radius
VAR _dashArray = FORMAT(_pct * _circumference, "0.0") & " " & FORMAT(_circumference, "0.0")
VAR _center = _size / 2
VAR _pctText = FORMAT(_pct * 100, "0") & "%25"
VAR _fontSize = _size / 5
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 " & _size & " " & _size & "'><circle cx='" & _center & "' cy='" & _center & "' r='" & _radius & "' fill='none' stroke='{{color_background}}' stroke-width='" & _strokeWidth & "'/><circle cx='" & _center & "' cy='" & _center & "' r='" & _radius & "' fill='none' stroke='{{color_fill}}' stroke-width='" & _strokeWidth & "' stroke-dasharray='" & _dashArray & "' transform='rotate(-90," & _center & "," & _center & ")' stroke-linecap='round'/><text x='" & _center & "' y='" & (_center + _fontSize * 0.35) & "' text-anchor='middle' font-size='" & _fontSize & "' font-weight='bold' fill='{{color_text}}'>" & _pctText & "</text></svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure

templates.name: Semi-Circle Gauge
templates.description: Half-circle gauge commonly used for speedometer-style displays.
templates.preview_svg: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 60'><path d='M10 50 A 40 40 0 0 1 90 50' fill='none' stroke='%23E5E7EB' stroke-width='10' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='M10 50 A 40 40 0 0 1 70 15' fill='none' stroke='%230EA5E9' stroke-width='10' stroke-linecap='round'/></svg>
templates.dax_template:
{{measure_name}} =
VAR _value = {{value_measure}}
VAR _maxValue = {{max_value}}
VAR _pct = MIN(MAX(_value / _maxValue, 0), 1)
VAR _width = {{width}}
VAR _strokeWidth = {{stroke_width}}
VAR _height = _width * 0.6
VAR _radius = (_width / 2) - _strokeWidth
VAR _centerX = _width / 2
VAR _centerY = _height - (_strokeWidth / 2)
VAR _halfCircumference = 3.14159 * _radius
VAR _dashArray = FORMAT(_pct * _halfCircumference, "0.0") & " " & FORMAT(_halfCircumference, "0.0")
VAR _bgPath = "M" & _strokeWidth & " " & _centerY & " A " & _radius & " " & _radius & " 0 0 1 " & (_width - _strokeWidth) & " " & _centerY
VAR _svg = "<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 " & _width & " " & _height & "'><path d='" & _bgPath & "' fill='none' stroke='{{color_background}}' stroke-width='" & _strokeWidth & "' stroke-linecap='round'/><path d='" & _bgPath & "' fill='none' stroke='{{color_fill}}' stroke-width='" & _strokeWidth & "' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-dasharray='" & _dashArray & "'/></svg>"
RETURN "data:image/svg+xml;utf8," & _svg

parameters.name: measure_name
parameters.description: Name for the new SVG measure
